Texts.Chs: 没有可以授粉的花朵，蜜蜂便会不高兴。找一些^orange;红色的花^reset;种在蜂园旁边，这样蜜蜂就会去采蜜。
Texts.Eng: Bees won't be happy without flowers to pollinate. Get a ^orange;Red Flower^reset; to plant next to your apiary and your bees will get going!

Texts.Chs: 多数花朵都可以产蜜，要有点耐心。蜜蜂要用心培养，它们只在有花和阳光的时候才^green;采蜜^reset;。^orange;蜜蜂花^reset;是它们的最爱，能让蜜蜂热情高涨。
Texts.Eng: Pretty much any flower will do, by the way. And be patient. Bees take time to breed, and they only ^green;'do it'^reset; when there are flowers and sun. ^orange;Bee Flowers^reset; are their favorite, and will make them work hardest.
